initial_results:
### Text snippet from document at k=1
: "Kiss Kiss Kiss" is a song by Japanese-American singer Yoko Ono. It was originally released on Double Fantasy, her joint album with John Lennon, as well as on the B-side of his "(Just Like) Starting Over" single.

### Text snippet from document at k=2
: "New York City" is a song written by John Lennon that was first released on Lennon's and Yoko Ono's 1972 album  Some Time in New York City.

### Text snippet from document at k=10
: "Well Well Well" is a song from the album John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band by John Lennon.
